description: This source file defines API routes for managing expenses in an expense tracker application. It includes route configurations for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting expense records, as well as fetching categories and statistics. The file also contains Swagger documentation annotations for API documentation generation.

methods.name: POST /api/expenses
methods.description: Create a new expense record with authentication and validation.

methods.name: GET /api/expenses
methods.description: Retrieve list of expenses with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: GET /api/expenses/categories
methods.description: Get all expense categories for the authenticated user.

methods.name: GET /api/expenses/stats
methods.description: Get statistical data about the user's expenses.

methods.name: GET /api/expenses/:id
methods.description: Retrieve a specific expense by its ID.

methods.name: PUT /api/expenses/:id
methods.description: Update an existing expense record with validation.

methods.name: DELETE /api/expenses/:id
methods.description: Delete an expense by its ID.
